2nd Year Anniversary

Happy Birthday Pixelnest

04 feb. 2016

Pixelnest is two years old today. Happy birthday!

To celebrate the event, a brand new update of Steredenn is available now. You want more? The game is on a special sale (-33%) on Steam for the occasion!

And as if it wasn’t enough, we have another great event today. Damien is a dad, now. Welcome to his son, Elouan!

4 february. 2016
By Matthieu Oger
